mdRecord.dcterms:title: Christaphor Bean by Sidney Howard
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for the play Christaphor Bean by Sidney Howard, June 19. St. John's Parish. Johnson City, Tennessee. "Admission 35 cents or its equivalent in produce."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
